code: import React from'react';import{Card}from'react-bootstrap';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Product(_ref){var product=_ref.product;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"my-3 p-3 rounded card-product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{className:"product-image",src:product.image})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{as:"div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:product.name})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{as:"div",children:[product.description.slice(0,30),"..."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{as:"h3",children:["Rs ",product.price]})]})]});}export default Product;

sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Product({ product }) { return ( {product.name} {product.description.slice(0, 30)}... Rs {product.price} ) } export default Product
